metadata.name: Beneath The Veil: SUBURBS
metadata.description:
Everything above the veil is familiar and safe, but you can't help but feel like there's something waiting beneath the veil.  
Format: 2560x1408 35s MP4  
Process: AI rotoscoped and processed from input video.  
Music: Purz - Beneath The Veil

A collaboration with Purz for 0xTHULU Artist Drops. Mint access for eligible Relic of Membership holders (https://opensea.io/collection/0xthulu-relic-of-membership-augmented) from 0xTHULU, also Purzbots (https://opensea.io/collection/purzbots) & Dreamtapes (https://opensea.io/collection/dreamtape) from Purz.
